name: I am Your President
detailed_description:
Play as another US president!
Have you ever thought that you would be a better president? Now you have the opportunity to check it out! Become the President. Decide on the fate of millions of people in your country and around the world. Create a US policy yourself! It sounds pretty simple, right?


Talk with politicians, journalists, generals and many others. Every conversation matters. This will be your main tool to change the world! However, remember that everything has its consequences. Maybe it's better to be careful? Or maybe the country needs a strong leader? It's up to you!


Each of your actions affects the state of the country and the world. Decide wisely to lead your country to a bright future and make America great again! ;).


  • Many interesting conversations
  • Impact on social moods
  • Impact on the country's development
  • Declare war!
  • ... or make peace treatment
  • Solve your coutry's problems
  • Choose your own political path

short_description: Play as another US president! Decide on the fate of millions of people in your country and around the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
